mapper.select: SELECT brd_no ,repl_no ,content ,sf_mask_ip(reg_ip) AS reg_ip ,sf_get_time_diff(reg_dt) AS time_elapsed ,reg_dt ,upd_dt FROM tb_reply WHERE 1=1 AND brd_no = #{brdNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_reply ( brd_no ,repl_no ,content ,passwd ,reg_ip ) SELECT #{brdNo} AS brd_no ,(SELECT NVL(MAX(repl_no),0) + 1 FROM tb_reply WHERE brd_no = #{brdNo}) AS repl_no ,#{content} AS content ,#{passwd} AS passwd ,#{regIp} AS reg_ip
mapper.select: SELECT (CASE WHEN EXISTS( SELECT repl_no FROM tb_reply WHERE repl_no = #{replNo} AND passwd = #{passwd}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS yn
